A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually stunning\, but looks aren't everything. One of the worstly written\, at times comedic throw-away to the Star Wars saga. Shame on you George Lucas for letting it get to this. \n\nThis reels of this movie should be burnt\, since it's now in the past we should let Episode 8 die\, and it's quite ironic that for a movie about failure and everyone failing\, no one failed more than the writer/director Rian Johnson.
